## EXISTING STRUCTURES

- Stone Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

- Burner Mining Drill (position 42.0, -83.0)

- Wooden Chest (position 42.5, -81.5)

### Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)

### Burner Inserter at position (42.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter (position 42.5, -80.5)

### Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter (position 43.5, -81.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the Stone Furnace to avoid "Not enough iron ore in the player's inventory" errors.

### Errors when using burner mining drills without fuel
- Always check that your burner mining drills are fueled before expecting them to operate. If they are out of fuel, they will not work.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for items
- If inserters are in a "WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS" or "WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION" state, ensure that the source or destination has the necessary items or space available.

### Errors when the Stone Furnace has no ingredients
- The Stone Furnace will not operate if it has no ingredients. Ensure you are supplying it with the necessary items for it to function.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- `insert_item(entity, item)`: Successfully inserts an item into the specified entity. Ensure the entity can accept the item type.
- `extract_item(entity, item)`: Successfully extracts an item from the specified entity. Ensure there is enough item in the entity to extract.

### Important Variables
- `coal`: int
- `iron_ore`: int
- `iron_plate`: int
- `iron_gear_wheel`: int
- `wood`: int
